title: Do Player designed Champions ever get implemented into leauge??
body:
Ok, so i am relatively new to league (playing since early this year), and i am wondering if any of the champion ideas posted to this section of the forum are ever implemented into LoL, please comment if you know the answer. Thank you in advance.

Also feel free to check out a friend and myselfs champion concept: http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-creations/cIWFxAvN-character-concept-gandri-warden-of-the-ironspikes

replies.body:
Ekko was a concept a few years ago

EDIT: Here's the link: http://forums.na.leagueoflegends.com/board/showthread.php?t=3851086
they should have left it as a concept
I seem to vaguely remember seeing a Red post a while ago about this being rare, due to intellectual property law or something along those lines but I don't remember exactly tbh.
generally in australia it's your intelluectual property once you've written the idea down (not sure if it counts on an internet forum however)

Yes, they do. Typically it is VERY rarely a champion, and more likely a skin.

I know for a fact that Braum's concept (a burly, manly man) came from a parody champion a player came up with. Thread [here](http://forums.na.leagueoflegends.com/board/showthread.php?t=2342104&highlight=angus+the+puncher) , concept comic [her](http://forums.na.leagueoflegends.com/board/attachment.php?attachmentid=947264&d=1397888708)e 

They will never take a champion idea verbatim. They typically just take the concept and work it from there. If a skin concept or art piece is frequently mentioned on the forums, it will eventually be implemented. The latest example of this is Pool Party Zac, whose idea was created on [deviantart ](http://www.deviantart.com/art/League-of-Legends-Pool-Party-Zac-488819619) 8 months ago.

So yeh, they do, but there is a lot of crap they have to filter through though...

Yes, Veigar is actually made and voiced by a summoner.
Something similar for Voli, and skins like Party fiddle sticks.

Medieval twitch was also made by 2 summoners.

Miss Fortune also was a user suggestion if i remember correctly. It's been before i joined League however, so for once, don't quote me on it.
(Also Wukong's clone is incredibly close to a suggested stealth spell i posted a few months earlier in a champ suggestion thread which got a lot of attention... but hey, could be anything, right?)

Ok, well thank you both for your input, and if u feel like it check out the character concept a friend and i created
URL: http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-creations/cIWFxAvN-character-concept-gandri-warden-of-the-ironspikes

if i ran a company like riot, i'd take people up on the superb concepts i see appear on the forums, however i can't say i've ever heard of them using an idea. (never seen anybody given credit in a champions history etc, and i've read them all.)
